original: unfold isPR. intros f g Hf Hg. unfold cNat. split. - exists (fun x => g (f x)). intros x. specialize (Hf x). destruct Hf as [Hf1 Hf2]. specialize (Hg (f x)). destruct Hg as [Hg1 Hg2]. unfold cRel, cNat in *. split. + exists (fun p => g (f p)). intros p. split. * exists (f p). split. -- apply Hf1. -- apply Hg2. * intros q. destruct q as [q1 q2]. simpl. apply Hg1. exists (f q1). split. -- apply Hf2. -- apply q2. + intros q. destruct q as [q1 q2]. simpl. apply Hg1. exists (f q1). split. * apply Hf2. * apply q2. - intros h H. unfold cRel, cNat in H. destruct H as [H1 H2]. unfold cRel, cNat in H1. destruct H1 as [H1 H2]. exists (fun p => cTriple (f (fst p)) (cTriple (g (fst p)) (snd p)) (h p)). intros p. specialize (H2 p). destruct H2 as [H2 H3]. split. + exists (fst p). split. * apply H1. * apply H2. + intros q. destruct q as [q1 q2]. simpl. apply H3. exists (fst q). split. * apply H1. * apply q2.
